io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems

Class HpSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
      • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.model.systems.HpSystem

  • public class HpSystem
extends com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
    A health points system. It can be used to query a Creature HP. It doesn't process entities in an Ashley engine loop.
    Since:
    2018-01-22
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz
